name: Rudolph Newton
description:
Rudolph Newton is an mathamatical game made for a younger audience with repeatability and education as it's core tenets.

You take on the role of Rudolph Newton  - Santa's No.1 Reindeer and mathematician. Through unknown circumstances, you've gotten lost and cannot find your way back to the North Pole...

...What makes it worse is that the Grinch is trying to shoot you out the sky!

Compete for a high-score and test your mathematical skills at the same time!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5 by 1 person using the "2 Girls 1 CPU Modifier" modifier.
